articles.title: ‘My manager says it’s not our fault if they can’t do math’: Server shares how they handle customer’s mistakes on the check’s tip line - The Daily Dot
articles.description: A server on TikTok recently went viral after joking about how she handles mistaken tips left by customers on checks.
